幋字的基本解释

幋
pán
大巾，可覆盖于衣上。
头巾。

幋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pán］
［《廣韻》薄官切，平桓，並。］
亦作“褩2”。
(1)覆衣大巾。
(2)裹头巾。
(3)袋囊。

幋字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　幋； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页334第39
【唐韻】薄官切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蒲官切，?音槃。【說文】覆衣大巾也。或以爲首鞶。【廣雅】巾也。

幋字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
幋字的起名意思

暂无。

large scarf
Basic explanation of words
large scarf
pán
Big towel can be covered on the clothes.
scarf.
large scarf
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pán］
["Guangyun" Boguan cut, Pinghuan, and. ]
Also known as "褩2".
(1) Covering a large towel.
(2) Wrap a headscarf.
(3) Pouch.
large scarf
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　幋; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 334 Page 39
[Tang Yun] Bo Guan cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Pu Guan cut,? Yinpan. [Said the text] The big scarf is also covered. Or think that the first one. [Guang Ya] Towels too.
large scarf
